subsection_name: benh-viem-xoang.json_4_Who is susceptible to the disease?
subsection_content:
People are at high risk of acute and chronic sinusitis if they fall into the following cases:
Deviated nasal septum; Have nasal polyps; Have asthma; Tooth and gum infections; Weak immune system; Allergies; Excessive exposure to environmental pollution such as cigarette smoke, dust, etc.
subsection_title: benh viem xoang.json. Who is susceptible to the disease?
